snippet.title: Will the Saints lift for Riewoldt?
snippet.content: WELCOME to Super Sunday, with three huge matches that will define the run to the finals. St Kilda must win against West Coast to keep its finals hopes alive, while the Eagles can move into the top eight with a victory at Etihad Stadium. MATCH CENTRE: RUN HOME: Will the retirement of champion Nick Riewoldt, announced midweek, inspire the Saints? Then Richmond and Hawthorn face off at the MCG in a game that could send the Tigers to third on the ladder or keep the Hawks' remarkable finals flame flickering. And the round finishes with one of the biggest Showdowns ever played as first-placed Adelaide takes on fifth-placed Port Adelaide in front of a packed house at Adelaide Oval.
